name: Oversea the Islands
description:
As a deity of this small world, your job is to build paths that connect all the islands you oversee.

This game is mostly a prototype of the island-connecting game mechanic.

Made for Ludum Dare 38

Controls:
  • WASD/Arrow keys - move camera
  • Left mouse click - place bridge
  • Right mouse click - delete bridge
  • Enter - start game, move to next level
  • Esc - pause
Resources:
  • jfxr - sound effects generator
  • m5x7 font by Daniel Linssen
